TopicTitle: Drunken Rocketry: Back From A Beer Run (Stream Starts 8 PM EST)

Articles.Content:
So I had taken a break for many personal reasons from streaming my experiments of the effect of alcohol on rocketry. However now I am back and more ready to science than ever before. I will start over from the beginning and start to build my inebriated space program so you all can see. Expect drunkenness, classical music and probably a few explosions. I plan on streaming for at least 2 hours tonight so feel free to stop by, crack open a beverage and enjoy.

Drunken Rocketry: Back From A Beer Run
